rows.label: tlk000901_09_msg0001
rows.name:
To reach Eden, you must stop
the Divine Beast creating
the Great Voidâ€” Serpent.

rows.label: tlk000901_09_msg0002
rows.name:
The one who gave Serpent its mission
was Zeke's homeland, Luxuria...

rows.label: tlk000901_09_msg0003
rows.name:
I have prepared a letter to
Luxuria. They should welcome
you as an envoy of Acedia.

rows.label: tlk000901_09_msg0004
rows.name:
And I want you to go to Eden before
Metsu and the others and find out what
it is. In place of my foolish self...
